data.scheme_name: Stamp Duty Refund Scheme - Service Enterprises - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 50% refund of Stamp Duty to data centres units.
data.eligibility: All existing  units located anywhere in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The unit must commence production within 5 years from the date of land purchase, with land purchased before 31.12.2025.
The unit should file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) for statistical purposes.
The unit must not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State government.
Units must obtained no objection certificate from the competent authority must be obtained, if applicable.
The unit should be in commercial production.
General category industrial units are eligible for Stamp Duty Refund, even if not in thrust areas.
The unit must remain in production for 5 years from the date of commercial production, with annual inspections by District MSME Centre.
data.beneficiaries: All existing  units located anywhere in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The unit must commence production within 5 years from the date of land purchase, with land purchased before 31.12.2025.
The unit should file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) for statistical purposes.
The unit must not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State government.
Units must obtained no objection certificate from the competent authority must be obtained, if applicable.
The unit should be in commercial production.
General category industrial units are eligible for Stamp Duty Refund, even if not in thrust areas.
The unit must remain in production for 5 years from the date of commercial production, with annual inspections by District MSME Centre.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: In pursuance to the provision under Chapter 14 of the Haryana Enterprises & Employment Policy, 2020 notified in Gazette vide No. 25/05/2020-4IB-I dated 29.12.2020 the Governor of Haryana notified “Stamp Duty Refund Scheme”
data.objective: To support the enterprise by providing the Stamp Duty refund
data.description:
Scheme provides refund of Stamp Duty to service units:
B category blocks: 30%
C category blocks: 50%
D category blocks: 50%
data.how_to_apply: All the eligible industrial units shall apply to the Director/ Director General, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises through web portal of the department in the prescribed application form along with attachments.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specific Service Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
